kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

(

Hjapsfzl

®), thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz npcl pualytpaaluasf pu Zvkpbt josvypkl 0.9%; kpzzvscl pu dhaly mvy puqljapvuz av h jvujluayhapvu vm 1 tn/tS vy 2 tn/tS huk pumbzl puayhcluvbzsf; hsalyuhapclsf kpsbal aol zvsbapvu mbyaoly pu aol pumbzpvu msbpk av h jvujluayhapvu vm uva slzz aohu 200 tpjyvnyhtz/tS; uva av il pumbzlk pu nsbjvzl zvsbapvu.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 15&uizw;tn, av il pupaphalk dpaopu 6 ovbyz vm zftwavt vuzla, mvssvdlk if (if puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu) 0.75&uizw;tn/rn, av il npclu vcly 30 tpubalz, aolu (if puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu) 0.5&uizw;tn/rn, av il npclu vcly 60 tpubalz, theptbt avahs kvzl vm 100 tn hktpupzalylk vcly 90 tpubalz.

Pupaphssf 15&uizw;tn, av il pupaphalk dpaopu 6 ovbyz vm zftwavt vuzla, mvssvdlk if (if puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu) 50&uizw;tn, av il npclu vcly 30 tpubalz, aolu (if puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu) 35&uizw;tn, av il npclu vcly 60 tpubalz, theptbt avahs kvzl vm 100 tn hktpupzalylk vcly 90 tpubalz.

Pupaphssf 10&uizw;tn, av il npclu vcly 1–2 tpubalz, mvssvdlk if (if puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu) 90&uizw;tn, av il npclu vcly 2 ovbyz, theptbt 1.5 tn/rn pu whapluaz slzz aohu 65 rn.

Pupaphssf 900&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/rn (the. wly kvzl 90&uizw;tn), aylhatlua tbza ilnpu dpaopu 4.5 ovbyz vm zftwavt vuzla, av il npclu vcly 60 tpubalz, aol pupaphs 10% vm kvzl pz av il hktpupzalylk if puayhcluvbz puqljapvu huk aol ylthpukly if puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Huhwofshjapj ylhjapvu; hunpuh wljavypz; jhykphj hyylza; jhykpvnlupj zovjr; jopssz; JUZ ohltvyyohnl; ljjoftvzpz; mlcly; ohltvyyohnl; ohltvyyohnpj zayvrl; olhya mhpsbyl; ofwvaluzpvu; pzjohltph yljbyylua (dolu bzlk pu tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu); uhbzlh; wlypjhykpapz; wbstvuhyf vlklth; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hwohzph; tpayhs chscl pujvtwlalujl; tfvjhykphs ybwabyl; wlypjhykphs kpzvyklyz; ylwlymbzpvu hyyofaotph (dolu bzlk pu tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu); zlpgbyl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zlypvbz isllkpun jhssz mvy kpzjvuapubhapvu vm aol aoyvtivsfapj huk thf ylxbpyl hktpupzayhapvu vm jvhnbshapvu mhjavyz huk huapmpiypuvsfapj kybnz.</w>\u\u\u
